CompendiumBrowserKeybind.Hint: Enables a keyboard shortcut to open the compendium browser
CompendiumBrowserKeybind.Name: Compendium Browser Keybind

LogLevel.Hint: How much do you want D.R.E.A.M to complain? (Alt+C by default)
LogLevel.Name: Debug Level

HighlightPreparedSpells.Name: Highlight Prepared Spells
HighlightPreparedSpells.Hint: Enabled highlighting prepared spells on the default 5e character sheet.

EnableCustomCurrencies.Name: Custom Currencies
EnableCustomCurrencies.Hint: Enable custom currency features for renaming and hiding currencies.

HidePP.Name: Hide Platinum
HidePP.Hint: Hide platinum currency from character sheets.

HideGP.Name: Hide Gold
HideGP.Hint: Hide gold currency from character sheets.

HideEP.Name: Hide Electrum
HideEP.Hint: Hide electrum currency from character sheets.

HideSP.Name: Hide Silver
HideSP.Hint: Hide silver currency from character sheets.

HideCP.Name: Hide Copper
HideCP.Hint: Hide copper currency from character sheets.

UseStandardCurrency.Name: Use Standard Currency
UseStandardCurrency.Hint: Convert all prices to display in the standard currency.

StandardCurrency.Name: Standard Currency
StandardCurrency.Hint: The currency to use as standard for all prices.

CompendiumBrowserKeybind.Hint: Opens the compendium browser directly (Alt+C by default)
CompendiumBrowserKeybind.Name: Open Compendium Browser
